post.text: Tune in on Facebook at 9pm ET for exclusive interviews, behind-the-scenes footage, and live coverage of Hillary accepting the nomination for president.

comment.author: Miranda
comment.text: We've had a democratic president for 8 years - why does hillary have so much work to do - she's not an agent for change she's more of the same

replies.author: Jennifer
replies.text: You and your moronic post are dumber than a box of rocks.

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: Go homies in California delegation! Stand up together and rise up against cheaters, bullies and thieves!! Hoping we boo hilLIARy off that crooked DNC stage tonight so we don't have to listen to her yell, whine and cacklet!!! PASS IT ON!!!!!!! #neverhilLIARy

replies.author: Dylan
replies.text: Hillary can't be trusted with Nation's Secrets. She is too reckless and too stupid.

replies.author: Dylan
replies.text: Hillary is agent provocateur. Hillary the grannies spice grill.
